nodes.text: Jawl was a male Kajain'sa'Nikto that lived during the Galactic Civil War. In 1 ABY he worked for the Hutt crime lord Jabba Desilijic Tiure and could be found in his palace on the planet Tatooine.

Jawl appeared as a non-player character in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
